channel.title: Use command once?
channel.description: I want to make people start off with money, but I dont know how, So I was thinking of making a command to add money but everybody would use it alot to get rich. So is it possible to make it so it only works once per person?

item.title: Use command once?
item.dc:creator: @crackheadKD crackheadKD
item.description:
@crackheadKD wrote:

I know hiyascape as a starter that doesn’t allow you to abuse, like you can only do it once no matter even if you logged 10000 times.
Try looking in that source… I’m not using hiyascape so… yea.

Read full topic

item.title: Use command once?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“eviltwin1, post:4, topic:193817”]slave the only problem with that one is that i used it for my starter command and they can just log out and log back in and do it again[/quote]Lol ya, I know…

Make a token, or better even, a .txt file, and add a reader to read if their name is in there… And if it is, then it gives the second message.

God, my sentences are really confusing today.

Read full topic

slave the only problem with that one is that i used it for my starter command and they can just log out and log back in and do it again

item.title: Use command once?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Ya.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("money") { int moneyCount = 0; if(moneyCount == 0) { addItem(995, 1000000); moneyCount++; } else { sendMessage("You've already got your moneyz!!!"); } }

There.

Read full topic
